identity.name: The Digital Cupid
identity.persona: A modern romantic artisan who blends old-school love letters with digital magic.

usage_rules.headings: Use Playfair Display for all main titles. Font weight: 700. Letter spacing: -0.02em.
usage_rules.body: Use Lato for functional text and long descriptions. Font weight: 400. Line height: 1.6.
usage_rules.script: Use Great Vibes for 'handwritten' notes, love poems, and signatures. Size must be at least 1.5x larger than body text for readability.
usage_rules.accent: Use Cormorant Garamond for subtitles or emphasis. Italicized often looks best.

usage_rules.backgrounds: Avoid pure white (#FFFFFF). Use 'main' (#FDFBF7) for a warm, paper-like feel.
usage_rules.text: Use 'primary.text' (#590D0E) for headings to give a deep red romantic feel, not black.
usage_rules.buttons: Primary buttons should be 'primary.main' with white text. Secondary buttons can be 'accent.pink' with 'primary.text'.
usage_rules.gradients: Use subtle gradients only. Example: 'bg-gradient-to-b from-[#FFF0F5] to-[#FDFBF7]'. Avoid harsh linear gradients.

containers.card: bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg border border-[#E2E2E2] p-6 relative overflow-hidden
containers.polaroid: bg-white p-4 pb-12 shadow-md rotate-1 hover:rotate-0 transition-transform duration-300 ease-out border border-gray-100

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-4 bg-[#9E2A2B] text-white font-serif font-bold tracking-wide shadow-lg hover:bg-[#7C1F20] hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-8 py-4 bg-[#FFD1DC] text-[#590D0E] font-serif font-bold hover:bg-[#E5989B] transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: text-[#9E2A2B] hover:bg-[#FFF0F5] rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

inputs.mad_libs: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-[#D4AF37] text-[#590D0E] font-serif text-xl focus:outline-none focus:border-[#9E2A2B] px-2 py-1 placeholder-[#E5989B] text-center w-full md:w-auto inline-block
inputs.standard: w-full rounded-lg border border-[#E2E2E2] bg-white px-4 py-3 text-[#333333] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#FFD1DC] focus:border-[#9E2A2B] outline-none transition-all

cards.interactive: cursor-pointer relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl shadow-xl transition-all duration-500 hover:shadow-2xl

principles.softness: Use spring animations with low stiffness and high damping for a 'floaty' feel.
principles.stagger: Always stagger children elements (0.1s delay) for lists or grids.
principles.interaction: All interactive elements must scale down slightly (0.95) on tap/click.

textures.noise: url('data:image/svg+xml,...') (Use a subtle noise SVG if possible)

decorations.rose_petals: Floating elements using absolute positioning and parallax.
decorations.gold_dust: Small yellow/gold circles with blur effects.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on colored backgrounds meets WCAG AA. Use dark red (#590D0E) on pink backgrounds, not white.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Respect 'prefers-reduced-motion'. Disable auto-playing animations if set.
accessibility.aria_labels: All interactive elements (hearts, scratch cards) must have descriptive aria-labels.

do_not: Do not use generic 'alert' or 'confirm' boxes. Use custom romantic modals.
Do not use default scrollbars. Style them thin and pink.
Do not use 'Inter' font for headings.
Do not use pure black (#000000). Use #333333 or #590D0E.
must_do: Always add a 'hover' state to interactive elements.
Ensure the 'Back' button is always visible in the creation flow.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: framer-motion, canvas-confetti, lucide-react, clsx, tailwind-merge.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new color palette and font families.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the 'Mad Libs' style input component first, as it's core to the 'About Her' section.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Implement the 'ScratchCard' component using HTML5 Canvas API.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Ensure the 'Share' functionality generates a unique URL (mocked or real).
